line.originaltext: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts
1 teaspoon olive oil
1/2 teaspoon onion powder
1 pinch salt
1 pinch ground black pepper
2 avocados - peeled, pitted and sliced
line.annotation: create_ing(ing79, "2 avocados - peeled, pitted and sliced")

line.originaltext: 2 ripe tomatoes, sliced
1 (8 ounce) package Monterey Jack cheese, cut into 10 slices
line.annotation: create_ing(ing81, "1 (8 ounce) package Monterey Jack cheese, cut into 10 slices")

line.originaltext: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Warm oil in skillet and add chicken and onion.
Warm oil in skillet and add chicken and onion.
Warm oil in skillet and add chicken and onion.
line.annotation: combine({ing74, ing76, ing82}, ing83, "oil chicken onion", "")

line.originaltext: Cook 15 minutes or until chicken is browned and just about done.
line.annotation: cook(ing83, t14, ing84, "cooked chicken", "cook 15 minutes or until chicken is browned and just about done")

line.originaltext: Cook 15 minutes or until chicken is browned and just about done.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
line.annotation: combine({ing77, ing78, ing84}, ing85, "seasoned chicken", "to taste")

line.originaltext: Add salt and pepper to taste.
Place chicken on cookie sheet and top each breast with 1 to 2 slices of tomato and 2 to 3 slices of cheese.
Place chicken on cookie sheet and top each breast with 1 to 2 slices of tomato and 2 to 3 slices of cheese.
line.annotation: combine({ing80, ing81, ing85}, ing86, "topped chicken", "1 to 2 slices of tomato and 2 to 3 slices cheese on top each breast")

line.originaltext: Place chicken on cookie sheet and top each breast with 1 to 2 slices of tomato and 2 to 3 slices of cheese.
Place in oven for 10 to 15 minutes, until cheese melts.
line.annotation: cook(ing86, t13, ing87, "baked chicken", "10 to 15 minutes, until cheese melts")

line.originaltext: Remove from oven, add 2 to 3 slices of avocado on top of each breast, and serve immediately.
Remove from oven, add 2 to 3 slices of avocado on top of each breast, and serve immediately.
line.annotation: combine({ing79, ing87}, ing88, "topped baked chicken", "2 to 3 slices of avocado on top of each breast")

line.originaltext: Remove from oven, add 2 to 3 slices of avocado on top of each breast, and serve immediately.
